title: Ticket #5573: support "secure attributes" which can't be modified over Q_SOCK
description:
Some attributes we do not want the user to ever change, because the hold some sort of internal or derived state. This is slightly different semantics fromt the "immutable" or "protected" attributes. As such, I propose to add SECURE_JOB_ATTRS and SYSTEM_SECURE_JOB_ATTRS.

These do NOT need to be documented in the manual.
